I realized that as I worked on improving
AI task by task data set by data set
that I was creating massive gaps holes
and blind spots in what it could
understand and while doing so I was
encoding all kinds of biases biases that
reflect a limited viewpoint limited to a

back to the evolution of the technology
that brought me to where I was that day
how the first color images were
calibrated against a white woman's skin
meaning that color photography was
biased against black faces and that same

facial recognition technology I thought
about the state of the art and research
today where we tend to limit our
thinking to one data set and one problem

that we had to think deeply about how
